pr_title: startup should fail if storage fails to start in some cases.

timeline.message:
startup should fail if storage fails to start in some cases.

 - startup now fails if storage causes anything other than a TimeoutException

 - added regression test to show storage failing for an IOException

 - added debug trace to include stack trace if context is required.

 fixes #2368

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText: We don't want to log this to the console.  Just a normal trace log in StorageBackedRecentChainData would be enough. We'll almost certainly hit this at least once during startup because of the order that services start.
timeline.author: ajsutton
